name: OklahomaCityThunder
0:
”Alexa, open the Oklahoma City Thunder”
”Alexa, ask the Oklahoma City Thunder who's winning tonight”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: oklahoma city thunder
Developer Terms of Use
des: The official Oklahoma City Thunder skill is your guide to every NBA season. Whether you’re looking for a recap of last night’s action, or looking for the Thunder's next game and how to watch it, this skill has you covered. You can also get the latest team headlines, stat leaders for every game, and check the Thunder's current conference standing!
